title: Mother Night
description: Librarian note: Alternate cover edition for ISBN 0385334141 / 9780385334143.Mother Night is a daring challenge to our moral sense. American Howard W. Campbell, Jr., a spy during World War II, is now on trial in Israel as a Nazi war criminal. But is he really guilty? In this brilliant book rife with true gallows humor, Vonnegut turns black and white into a chilling shade of gray with a verdict that will haunt us all.
author: Kurt Vonnegut Jr.
